/usr/local/cuda-12.8/bin/nvcc -O3 -DNDEBUG CMakeFiles/main.dir/main.cpp.o -o ../main   -L/usr/local/cuda-12.8/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.8/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -L/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/13  libcudaviz.a -lcuda -lcudart -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl -lstdc++ -lm -lgcc_s -lgcc -lc -lgcc_s -lgcc
